item.title: [pi] help whips
item.dc:creator: @99_stats_ftw 99 stats ftw
item.description:
@99_stats_ftw wrote:

I’ll spoonfeed because everyone learns from tuts.

case 15111: itemDef.name = "Lime whip"; itemDef.actions = new String[5]; itemDef.actions[1] = "Wield"; itemDef.editedModelColor = new int[2]; itemDef.newModelColor = new int[2]; itemDef.editedModelColor[0] = 17350; itemDef.newModelColor[0] = 528; itemDef.editedModelColor[1] = 0; itemDef.newModelColor[1] = 0; itemDef.modelID = 5412; itemDef.modelZoom = 840; itemDef.modelRotation2 = 280; itemDef.modelRotation1 = 0; itemDef.anInt204 = 0; itemDef.modelOffset1 = -2; itemDef.modelOffset2 = 56; itemDef.anInt165 = 5409; itemDef.anInt200 = 5409; itemDef.aByte154 = -11; itemDef.description = "It's a Lime whip."; break;

Post any errors you receive with [code/code]

Read full topic
